actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to exempt the Department of Medicine and Surgery in the Veterans' Administration from any Office of Management and Budget policy or directive prescribing procedures for contracting-out commercial or industrial functions.

summary.text: Excludes the Department of Medicine and Surgery in the Veterans' Administration from any requirements for contracting out commercial and industrial functions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to exempt the Department of Medicine and Surgery in the Veterans' Administration from any Office of Management and Budget policy or directive prescribing procedures for contracting-out commercial or industrial functions.
